intro: Meibomia tenuicula, commonly known as the slender meibomia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Meibomia tenuicula is often found in humid climates and is adapted to thrive in low-light conditions.
